item.title: Summary - Tropical Storm Jose (AT2/AL122017)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...JOSE EXPECTED TO RESTRENGTHEN BY THE WEEKEND... As of 11:00 AM AST Thu Sep 14 the center of Jose was located near 24.9, -66.6 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 989 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: Jose
nhc:Cyclone.nhc:headline: ...JOSE EXPECTED TO RESTRENGTHEN BY THE WEEKEND...
